reviews.review: Very clean and well maintained property.  Staff are very friendly and willing to go beyond expectations.   Rooms are well kept.  We had one issue with the air conditioner icing up.  They immediately upgraded us to a cottage even though they had fixed the problem.  The beach

Wonderful Amenities... One of the best property on Kuta beach, Bali. Staff is very supportive & kind-hearted... Food is also very good. If you are vegetarian than they also prepare special food for you. Will love to come again

reviews.quotes: Great location - Great room - Great staff - Great food - A great place to stay
reviews.review: We have returned many times and it keeps getting better  Happy to recommend to all age groups  Situated opposite the beach and has a fantastic pool but the big highlight is the friendly staff.we will be returning

Wonderful Gem of a resort. Reasonably priced, spacious clean rooms, excellent, friendly staff and management. They really went out of their way to accommodate. The Spa was wonderful, made many trips :) Great buffet breakfast and good menu choices. It was steps to the beach area

Overall Nice Stay. Max. 100 Mtr distance to the Beach. So location is perfect. You can see the Sea while having the Breakfast.  I have taken Sea Facing Room but I can see the little bit of Sea from my Room.  Overall Food, Stay, Cleanliness was very good.  Except their Corridor

Overall Nice Stay. Max. 100 Mtr distance to the Beach. So location is perfect. You can see the Sea while having the Breakfast.  I have taken Sea Facing Room but I can see the little bit of Sea from my Room.  Overall Food, Stay, Cleanliness was very good.  Except their Corridor

Hi fellow travellers!  I needed a place to stay for just one night as I was arriving late and didn't want the hassle of a long trip from airport. I didn't want to spend too much cash either so chose this hotel for both price and location.  What a find!  Located opposite the

The location is perfect. In front of the sea. The hotel is spacious, large, clean and the staff is lovely. The atmosphere transmits you relax. I totally recommend this wonderful place. Thank you to the personal working there. It was a real pleasure.  Nereida

Very nice hotel, with lovely, lovely staff...frendly and helpful 🤗 good food and great pool. Thank you for our 2 weeks ...no problems, no worries...! 😎😍 When you find the beach not as clean as you like it to be...think about what we have done with our beautiful planet...☺️

Had a wonderful time again .Lovely staff everyone very pleasant. My grandchildren loved the hotel the staff were lovely to them .Breakfast very good many choices available.Will certainly stay again.Great location in Kuta plenty of restaurants markets and beach across the road.

First stay ever in Bali and Seaview was a great start to the holiday. I could have stayed longer. Great staff, room, service, pool, bar, location. Would go back in a heartbeat. The room was lovely and staff helpful. Buffet breakfast was awesome. Just across the road from the

First stay ever in Bali and Seaview was a great start to the holiday. I could have stayed longer. Great staff, room, service, pool, bar, location. Would go back in a heartbeat. The room was lovely and staff helpful. Buffet breakfast was awesome. Just across the road from the

I have been staying in this hotel for so many times and I found out on my latest stay that the restaurant has been upgraded.  Not only the interior but the most important thing is the variety of the menu for our breakfast, providing Western, Chinese,  traditional and modern

We stayed in Kuta Seaview 2 weeks. We love this place from first time. Check in was simple and easy! Winaya (driver from resort) met us at the airport and after 15-20 min we rich resort. Room was big and clean with big balcony where I was smoking. Big screen tv with at least 30

Our first stay here but not our last. We stayed in the deluxe  cottage and its perfect. All the staff are very friendly and always asking if there is anything they can do for us . Service is amazing. We will definitely be coming back here with our children. The location is very

We stayed here for 12 nights and have had a wonderful time  here..many staff always with a smile. .rooms are clean and big with plenty of  diff options..we stayed in a delux room. Next time we will choose a suite or cottage..restaurant  has a fabulous beeakfast with so much to

A very nice green resort where you can forget you're in Kuta once you step inside. Very good rooms with the most comfortable beds. Breakfast was decent as is the pool area which could benefit from working WiFi and somehow cooling as it is actual bath temperature. What makes this

reviews.quotes: We have just had our 5th visit to Seaview Kuta Boutique
reviews.review: After numerous stays at the beautiful hotel we will be back again this year  The rooms are lovely  The staff and amenities are what makes us come back  Cannot recommend high enough looking forward to our stay in 2019

Stayed once again at The Kuta Seaview and could not have had a better stay.  The staff are amazing, in particular Hardi went above and beyond to make our stay the best experience.  We just love this place and have been back many many times. The food, rooms, staff, grounds and

Stayed here for 4 days in July, nice & central location opposite the beach, friendly staff nice food & drink at the beach bar, our room not far from the pool was smaller than we thought it would be & very dark, also the cats make a screeching noise at night outside our room

reviews.quotes: Great Hotel, across the street from the beach
reviews.review: I stayed here for 4 nights. It's an easy ride from the airport after a long flight. The staff was so helpful and welcoming. The rooms are clean and private. Great  atmosphere by the pool and the restaurant for dinner is surprisingly good. Not to mention a fantastic breakfast

Wow where do I start I have stayed in Bali numerous times and coming to stay at Kuta Seaview was one of my most wonderful experiences. It was like I have gained a new family. All of the staff were so friendly and helpful nothing was to hard for them . The accommodation is what a

Friendly management with prompt service for any questions we had, nice pool and scenic walkway, good rooms, nice breakfast and dinner at Rosso Vivo restaurant (in resort), spa was also good, very close to beach, overall enjoyed our stay

The hotel located in the center of the activities at jalan pantai in kuta,also a few steps from the shore. The hotel has a very nice stuff and people at administration are welling to help at anytime.  Really I enjoyed staying in this hotel.   Thanks for all stuff and members.

Big thanks to the whole team of Kuta Seaview hotel for their hospitality, they made our staying enjoyable.  The place was fantastic,clean and provides what you needs in everyday basis. And what I like the most it is calm place and suitable for a family vacation.

reviews.quotes: Good Infrastructure, Not so good experience
reviews.review: Good things first...  1) It's a beautiful property in terms of infrastructure...the fact that a lot of passion has gone into making it is visible in all aspects of the hotel design.  2) Room cleaning: I have never seen such efficient and proactive room cleaning in any other

great location with many commercial establishments near by inlcuding the beach. However disappointed to book a sea facing room paying extra, not to be able to see the sea at all :(  breakfast was great with many options (indonesian and continental)
